definitions.meaning:
[uncountable ( informal, sometimes disapproving)
used to refer to a substance, material, group of objects, etc. when you do not know the name,
 when the name is not important or when it is obvious what you are talking about 
（事物名称不详、无关紧要或所指事物明显时用）东西，物品，玩意儿

examples.content:
What's all that sticky stuff on the carpet? 
地毯上那黏乎乎的都是什么玩意儿？

The chairs were covered in some sort of plastic stuff. 
椅子都包了一种塑料膜。

( disapproving) I don't know how you can eat that stuff! 
我不明白你怎么能吃那种东西！

definitions.meaning:
( informal) used to refer in a general way to things that people do, say, think, etc. 
（泛指）活儿，话，念头，东西

examples.content:
I've got loads of stuff to do today. 
我今天有好多事儿要做。

I like reading and stuff. 
我喜欢看书什么的。

This is all good stuff.Well done! 
这一切都不错。干得漂亮！

definitions.meaning:
stuff (of sth)
( formal or literary) the most important feature of sth; something that sth else is based on or is made from 
基本特征；特质；根本；基础；原料

examples.content:
The trip was magical; the stuff of which dreams are made. 
那次旅行很奇妙，宛如梦境。

Parades and marches were the very stuff of politics in the region. 
游行示威是那一地区政治活动的基本内容。

definitions.meaning:
to fill a space or container tightly with sth 
填满；装满；塞满；灌满

examples.content:
She had 500 envelopes to stuff with leaflets. 
她得在 500 个信封里装上传单。

definitions.meaning:
stuff sth + adv./prep. 
to push sth quickly and carelessly into a small space
把…塞进（或填进）

examples.content:
She stuffed the money under a cushion. 
她把钱塞到软垫底下。

His hands were stuffed in his pockets. 
他两手插在口袋里。

definitions.meaning:
stuff sth 
to fill a vegetable, chicken, etc. with another type of food
 在（蔬菜、鸡等）里填入（另外一种食物）；给…装馅

examples.content:
Are you going to stuff the turkey? 
你打算给火鸡加填料吗？

definitions.meaning:
( informal) to eat a lot of food or too much food; to give sb a lot or too much to eat 
（使）吃撑，吃足，吃得过饱

examples.content:
He sat at the table stuffing himself.
 他坐在桌前大吃大嚼。

definitions.meaning:
[usually passive ] stuff sth 
to fill the dead body of an animal with material and preserve it, so that it keeps its original shape and appearance 
制作（动物）标本

examples.content:
They had had their pet dog stuffed. 
他们请人把他们的宠物狗制成了标本。
